episodes.title: Is Richard Branson Threatening Me Over Epstein Files?
episodes.description:
Looks like someone is getting nervous about the Epstein Files. Richard Branson’s people sent us a threatening email because we accurately pointed out that he is in those files…

On last week’s show with Gareth Reynolds, we discussed the most recent dump of files that had come out. Wouldn’t you know it, Branson showed up in a number of Jeff’s emails. There is also a picture of the two men together that came out. Now, this doesn’t necessarily mean Richard is guilty of any crimes, and we never said he was. But then we got an email from Branson’s press department that told us there would be serious consequences for reporting inaccurate information.

We never accused Branson of grave wrongdoing in that episode, merely what his emails to Epstein suggest: that he was giving advice to Epstein on how to get out of his many assault allegations. Yet getting an email like this certainly makes him look scared. Why would you be scared if you haven’t done anything wrong, Rich? Anyway, here is Virgin Groups statement again:

“Any contact Richard and Joan Branson had with Epstein took place on only a few occasions more than twelve years ago, and was limited to group or business settings, such as a charity tennis event. When Epstein offered a charity donation, the Bransons asked their team to carry out due diligence before accepting the donation, which uncovered serious allegations. As a result of what the due diligence uncovered, Virgin Unite did not take the donation and Richard and Joan decided not to meet or speak with Epstein again. Had they had the full picture and information, there would have been no contact whatsoever – Richard believes that Epstein’s actions were abhorrent and supports the right to justice for his many victims.”

See Francesca LIVE Saturday February 14th at 9:30pm Pasadena for New World Disorder:

episodes.title: Is Tulsi Gabbard In A Cult?
episodes.description:
Who is Tusli Gabbard really? 

She's been a national figure for at least a decade, but the more we learn about her the weirder it gets. Gabbard first made national news when she bucked the rest of the Democratic party to endorse Bernie Sanders over Clinton in the 2016 primaries (good), but in the most recent election she supported Trump through and through (bad). To reward her loyalty, Trump selected her to be his Director of National Intelligence, a highly important job within the U.S. national security apparatus. 

Tulsi is an enigmatic figure but one thing recently surfacing about the former Democrat is her family’s ties to the Science of Identity Foundation. This organization is based in Hawaii and “combines the teaching of yoga with aspects of Gaudiya Vaishnava theology.” Though it seems benign on the surface, we spoke to the guys from the Conspirituality Podcast about what they believe is a cult. 

Nearly 100 national security officials have signed on to a letter asking senators to take a harder look at Gabbard’s appointment, in part, citing her relationship with the Science of Identity Foundation. At the same time, however, we should also be mindful of other powerful people in politics and their cult-like affiliations. For example, Justice Amy Coney Barret is part of the People of Praise—which has a similar story. 

What do you think? Is this worth investigating further? 

Come see Francesca at The Ice House in Pasadena on Wednesday January 22nd with Aida Rodriguez, Matt Lieb, James Fritz and Chloe Hilliard. https://www.showclix.com/event/the-ice-house-new-world-disorder-1-22-25-7-30-pm

episodes.title: RFK Jr. And the MAHA Crazies *FRANTASTIC FRIDAYS* with Conspirituality Podcast
episodes.description: Bernie Sanders says RFK Jr. is "right" about the food industry? Should we be giving this anti-science kook any credit as he takes over Health and Human Services? Hosts of the podcast Conspirituality, Matthew Remski and Derek Beres join Francesca to discuss RFK Jr.'s lawyer suing to rescind the polio vaccine, the National Institute of Health nominee and COVID herd immunity guy Jay Bhattacharya, the continued fallout of the United Healthcare CEO's murder, and Tulsi Gabbard in a far-right Hindu cult! All the fun stuff!! Featuring: Matthew Remski, Conspirituality Podcast https://bsky.app/profile/matthewremski.bsky.social Derek Beres, Conspirituality Podcast https://bsky.app/profile/derekberes.bsky.social *** The Bitchuation Room Podcast is available everywhere you get your podcasts.
